item.title: How to Read and Write CSV Files in Python
item.description: update log 2022-09-30: change order of read and write section; other small fixes. In this post, I will share the most convenient way to read and write CSV files (with or w/o headers) in Python. Read CSV files # Use the builtin CSV module # Python has a built-in CSV module that deals with CSV files. CSV module provides a CSV reader, which we can use to read CSV files.
